description: This is a Dart class implementing a notification service in a Flutter application. It manages push notifications, including initialization, enabling/disabling notifications, showing local notifications, handling notification taps, and retrieving the device token. The class appears to be a stub or scaffold with key functionality marked as TODOs.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class for managing push notifications within a Flutter app.

methods.name: notificationsEnabled
methods.description: Getter for whether notifications are enabled.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the notification service, including setup procedures.

methods.name: enableNotifications
methods.description: Enables push notifications and related features.

methods.name: showLocalNotification
methods.description: Displays a local notification with specified title and body.

methods.name: handleNotificationTap
methods.description: Handles user interaction when a notification is tapped.
